author: SciShow
description:
When you think of animals of Antarctica, there's nothing more classic than a penguin. But new research suggests that these lovable waddling water birds didn't get their start on the icy continent. Turns out, they're from Australia?

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: All Penguins Are From Australia
